title: The Proclamation of 1763 did which of the follo...

content.prompt: The Proclamation of 1763 did which of the following?

choices.label: Prohibited colonists from producing iron for the American market.
Forbade all colonial trade with the French West Indies.
Set a boundary along the crest of the Appalachians beyond which the English colonists were forbidden to settle.
Announced the reorganization of the colonial office under Parliament, rather than directly under the King-in-Council.

topic.text: 3.2: Seven Years' War (The French and Indian War)

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
